name: Osprey Seral 7 Waist Pack - Women's
categories: Shoulder bags, slings and waist packs
description:
A bum bag with a bladder? Yep. Osprey has managed to tuck a 1.5L hydration pack into the Seral, with enough room for trail essentials. Lets you ramble without a backpack and without loaded pockets.Padded air mesh back panel, for lightweight comfort and air flow.Rear pocket fits a hydration reservoir with room for a jacket, tools and spare tube.2 zippered hipbelt pockets carry snacks and small items.Includes Osprey Hydraulics® 1.5L lumbar reservoir by Hydrapak.Magnetic attachment holds bite valve for convenient grabbing.Reflective loop holds blinky light (not included).

        Sustainability
